geometricPrimitives

Class Shapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometricPrimitives.Shapes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shapes
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for moving object used by BasicGUI
    Author:
    Ernest Cheung
